name: mapbox-gl-dual-scale-control
description: Dual scalebar (metric + imperial) control for Mapbox GL
author: Kristofor Carle <kris@maphubs.com>

scripts.build-dev: mkdir -p dist && browserify src/index.js --debug --ignore-transform unassertify --standalone DualScaleControl > dist/mapbox-gl-dual-scale-control-dev.js
scripts.build-min: mkdir -p dist && browserify src/index.js --debug --plugin [minifyify --map mapbox-gl-dual-scale-control.js.map --output dist/mapbox-gl-dual-scale-control.js.map] --standalone DualScaleControl | derequire > dist/mapbox-gl-dual-scale-control.js
